gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `PropertyPlantEquipment` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `PropertyPlantEquipment` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` MUST NOT be reported, because `PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` MUST NOT be reported, because `PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_PropertyPlantEquipment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_PropertyPlantEquipment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `BuildingsMember` MUST be equal to `Buildings` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and BuildingsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `ConstructionInProgressPrepaymentsPropertyPlantEquipmentMember` MUST be equal to `ConstructionInProgressPrepaymentsPropertyPlantEquipment` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and ConstructionInProgressPrepaymentsPropertyPlantEquipmentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `InventoryAndAppliancesMember` MUST be equal to `InventoryAndAppliances` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and InventoryAndAppliancesMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `LandMember` MUST be equal to `Land` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and LandMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` MUST be equal to `PropertyPlantEquipment` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and PropertyPlantEquipmentMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `PropertyPlantEquipmentNotUsedInOperationsMember` MUST be equal to `PropertyPlantEquipmentNotUsedInOperations` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and PropertyPlantEquipmentNotUsedInOperationsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` reported with `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and `TangibleAssetsOtherMember` MUST be equal to `TangibleAssetsOther` without `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` and TangibleAssetsOtherMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
